biography: Durand Jones is a singer and saxophonist from Hillaryville, Louisiana, United States. Best known as the frontman of soul revival outfit Durand Jones & The Indications, he released his first solo album in May 2023. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Durand Jones
